title: Make Operation Coinmaker votes exclusively on gspi.finance governance system
body:
For these first rounds of coinmaker it's great to let everyone vote on social media. But as we get attraction, we have way more benefit to make the votes only available on our gspi governance system
Hence, since the very first utility of GSPI is to vote, it seems legitimate that voting for Coinmaker operation should be exclusive to hodlers(and stakers soon) of GSPI.
choices: Yes Operation coinmaker votes should be exclusively for GSPI hodlers and stakers
Yes but we should find a middle ground to allow social media communities to participate in a way also
No, because GSPI will go to the Moon to soon if we do that.
author: 0xA2cF7A1E7E6f857478f72105DE598bb2bf5DfdDe
